column4: Guys, I'm only on day 3 of Ubuntu and my laptop says things like "[206.160005] [<c01033ec>] syscall_call+0x7/0xb" all over the screen. What should I do?
Do a backtrace and post a bug on lkml.org
I don't know what a backtrace is
Than you can do nothing about it. Perhaps apt-get dist-upgrade and try a new kernel.
